Summary: Tip-link proteins (CDH23, PCDH15) activates MET channel (CIB2, LHFPL5, LRTOMT, PCDH15, TMC1, TMC2, TMIE).

Complex assembly from Aminoglycoside antibiotics (amikacin, gentamicin, kanamycin, paromomycin, plazomicin, streptomycin, tobramycin), MT-RNR1 to MT-RNR1/aminoglycoside complex (amikacin, gentamicin, kanamycin, paromomycin, plazomicin, streptomycin, tobramycin, MT-RNR1).

Complex assembly from Aminoglycoside antibiotics (amikacin, gentamicin, kanamycin, paromomycin, plazomicin, streptomycin, tobramycin), Coatomer complex (ARCN1, COPA, COPB1, COPB2, COPE, COPG1, COPG2, COPZ1, COPZ2) to Aminoglyside/coatomer complex (amikacin, gentamicin, kanamycin, paromomycin, plazomicin, streptomycin, tobramycin, ARCN1, COPA, COPB1, COPB2, COPE, COPG1, COPG2, COPZ1, COPZ2).
MT-RNR1/aminoglycoside complex (amikacin, gentamicin, kanamycin, paromomycin, plazomicin, streptomycin, tobramycin, MT-RNR1) leads to negative regulation of translational fidelity.

Transport from Aminoglycoside antibiotics (amikacin, gentamicin, kanamycin, paromomycin, plazomicin, streptomycin, tobramycin) to Aminoglycoside antibiotics (amikacin, gentamicin, kanamycin, paromomycin, plazomicin, streptomycin, tobramycin).

Transport from Aminoglycoside antibiotics (amikacin, gentamicin, kanamycin, paromomycin, plazomicin, streptomycin, tobramycin) to Aminoglycoside antibiotics (amikacin, gentamicin, kanamycin, paromomycin, plazomicin, streptomycin, tobramycin). This interaction is catalyzed by MET channel (CIB2, LHFPL5, LRTOMT, PCDH15, TMC1, TMC2, TMIE).
